articles.title: Taylor Swift lands her second number one album in 2020 with her newest release Evermore - Daily Mail
articles.description: Taylor Swift is having a very successful year. Last week, her most recent album Evermore topped the Billboard 200 chart, and has become one of the highest-selling albums of the year.
